description: Three well-dressed men, reminiscent of mobsters, stand on a bridge dropping a small dog into the water below. The dog has blocks tied to its feet, a surreal and absurd take on the 'cement shoes' trope from gangster films. This dark action is presented with a deadpan absurdity, applying a severe, disproportionate punishment typically reserved for humans to a dog for a minor offense.
caption: “He bit the Godfather.”
